txt.en: 'Yellowfang is no more? I am surprised, [placeholder], but I have no reason to doubt your words. It could be that I misjudged your worth as a hunter.'
'I will lead the way back to Adso's Camp, [placeholder], if you are ready to leave.'

'Yellowfang is hiding somewhere within the Old Forest, but you will need to show some cunning of your own if you are to locate her, [placeholder].\n\n'I will wait for you to defeat the mighty wolf. If you are worthy of calling yourself a hunter, you should be able to do this deed.'
Gytha Lainey has brought you into the Old Forest to challenge your skill as a hunter.

Yellowfang is somewhere within the Old Forest.\n\nGytha Lainey has tasked you with defeating Yellowfang, a deadly wolf that stalks the Old Forest. She warned you that Yellowfang is cunning, and you will need to devise some way to lure her out of hiding.
Gytha Lainey is waiting for you somewhere in the Old Forest.\n\nGytha will be both pleased and surprised to know that you have defeated Yellowfang.
